content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals heather the hippopotamus is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70459ad skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 4 colors 1 ball each *shown in violet azalea pink cocoa zinnia* crochet hook - size f-5 3 75 mm crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing bikini set is worked separately then sewn onto hippo some construction required to finish
